name: Farm Race 3D
description:
Tap left and right buttons to turn and tap center to jump over fences. Kick barrels, collect coins and complete the race!

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive action running game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
